com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.dom

Interface DOMElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DOMEventTarget, DOMNode, SearchContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DOMFormControlElement, DOMFormElement, DOMFrameElement, DOMInputElement, DOMOptionElement, DOMSelectElement, DOMTextAreaElement 

    public interface DOMElement
extends DOMNode
    Represents DOM HTML element.
    表示DOM HTML元素。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns an attribute value by name.
      按名称返回属性值。

      Returns a map that contains attributes of the current element.
      返回包含当前元素属性的映射。

      Returns bounds of the element and its position relative to the top-left of the viewport of the current document.
      返回元素的边界及其相对于当前文档视口左上角的位置。
      java.lang.String getInnerHTML()
      Returns a string that represents inner HTML of the current element.
      返回表示当前元素的内部HTML的字符串。
      java.lang.String getInnerText()
      Returns the text assigned to the element or empty string when the element cannot contain text (for example, an IMG element).
      当元素不能包含文本（例如，IMG元素）时，返回分配给元素的文本或空字符串。

      Returns true when an attribute with a given name is specified on this element or has a default value, false otherwise.
      如果在此元素上指定了具有给定名称的属性或具有默认值，则返回true，否则返回false。

      Removes an attribute specified by name.
      删除由名称指定的属性。

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        java.lang.String getAttribute(java.lang.String name)
        Returns an attribute value by name.
        按名称返回属性值。
        Parameters:
        name - the attribute name. -属性名称。
        Returns:
        a string that represents an attribute value or empty string if the value isn't exist. 代表属性值的字符串，如果该值不存在，则为空字符串。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name parameter is null or empty.
        See Also:
        hasAttribute(String)

      • setAttribute

        boolean setAttribute(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Adds a new attribute. If an attribute with that name is already present in the element, its value is changed to be that of the value parameter.
        添加一个新属性。如果元素中已经存在具有该名称的属性，则其值将更改为value参数的值。
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute to create or alter. -要创建或更改的属性的名称。
        value - value to set in string form. -以字符串形式设置的值。
        Returns:
        true when attribute was added successfully. 属性添加成功时。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name or value parameter is null or empty.

      • removeAttribute

        void removeAttribute(java.lang.String name)
        Removes an attribute specified by name.
        删除由名称指定的属性。
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute to remove. -要删除的属性的名称。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name parameter is null or empty.

      • hasAttribute

        boolean hasAttribute(java.lang.String name)
        Returns true when an attribute with a given name is specified on this element or has a default value, false otherwise.
        如果在此元素上指定了具有给定名称的属性或具有默认值，则返回true，否则返回false。
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute to look for. -要查找的属性的名称。
        Returns:
        true if an attribute with the given name is specified on this element or has a default value, false otherwise. 如果在此元素上指定了具有给定名称的属性或具有默认值，则为否则。
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name parameter is null or empty.

      • getAttributes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes()
        Returns a map that contains attributes of the current element.
        返回包含当前元素属性的映射。
        Returns:
        a map that contains attributes of the current element. Returns empty map if the current element doesn't have any attribute. 包含当前元素属性的地图。如果当前元素没有任何属性，则返回空地图。

      • getInnerHTML

        java.lang.String getInnerHTML()
        Returns a string that represents inner HTML of the current element.
        返回表示当前元素的内部HTML的字符串。
        Returns:
        a string that represents inner HTML of the current element or empty string if the current element doesn't have inner HTML or the element doesn't exist anymore. 一个表示当前元素的内部HTML的字符串，或者如果当前元素不具有内部HTML或该元素不再存在，则为空字符串。

      • setInnerHTML

        boolean setInnerHTML(java.lang.String html)
        Replaces inner HTML of the current element with specified html.
        用指定的html替换当前元素的内部HTML。
        Parameters:
        html - a new inner HTML of the current element. -当前元素的新内部HTML。
        Returns:
        true when HTML code of the current element was replaced successfully. 成功替换当前元素的HTML代码时。

      • getInnerText

        java.lang.String getInnerText()
        Returns the text assigned to the element or empty string when the element cannot contain text (for example, an IMG element).
        当元素不能包含文本（例如，IMG元素）时，返回分配给元素的文本或空字符串。
        Returns:
        the text assigned to the element. 分配给元素的文本。
        See Also:
        DOMNode.getTextContent(), getInnerHTML()

      • setInnerText

        boolean setInnerText(java.lang.String innerText)
        Sets the text assigned to the element.

        If you attempt to assign HTML to an element with InnerText, the HTML code will display as literals in the document, just as if you were viewing HTML within a text file. If you assign HTML to an element using the InnerHTML property, InnerText will return all of the text in that HTML with the markup removed.

        Assigning a value to InnerText will destroy any child elements that belong to the element.
        设置分配给元素的文本。如果尝试使用InnerText将HTML分配给元素，则HTML代码将在文档中显示为文字，就像在文本文件中查看HTML一样。如果使用InnerHTML属性将HTML分配给元素，则InnerText将返回该HTML中已删除标记的所有文本。为InnerText分配值将破坏属于该元素的所有子元素。
        Parameters:
        innerText - the element's text, absent any HTML markup. If the element contains child elements, only the text in those child elements will be preserved. -元素的文本，没有任何HTML标记。如果元素包含子元素，则仅保留那些子元素中的文本。
        Returns:
        true when the element's text was set successfully, otherwise - false when the element cannot contain text (for example, an IMG element). 成功设置元素的文本时；否则-当元素不能包含文本时（例如，IMG元素）。
        See Also:
        DOMNode.setTextContent(String), setInnerHTML(String)

      • getBoundingClientRect

        java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingClientRect()
        Returns bounds of the element and its position relative to the top-left of the viewport of the current document.

        The amount of scrolling that has been done of the viewport area (or any other scrollable element) is taken into account when computing the bounding rectangle. This means that the rectangle's boundary edges (top, left, bottom, and right) change their values every time the scrolling position changes (because their values are relative to the viewport and not absolute). If you need the bounding rectangle relative to the top-left corner of the document, just add the current scrolling position to the top and left properties (these can be obtained using window.scrollX and window.scrollY) to get a bounding rectangle which is independent from the current scrolling position.

        返回元素的边界及其相对于当前文档视口左上角的位置。在计算边界矩形时，应考虑到视口区域（或任何其他可滚动元素）已完成的滚动量。这意味着，每次滚动位置更改时，矩形的边界边缘（顶部，左侧，底部和右侧）都会更改其值（因为其值是相对于视口而不是绝对的）。如果您需要相对于文档左上角的边界矩形，只需将当前滚动位置添加到top和left属性（可以使用window.scrollX和window.scrollY获得）即可获得一个边界矩形。与当前滚动位置无关。
        Returns:
        bounds of the HTML element and its position relative to the top-left of the viewport. HTML元素的边界及其相对于视口左上角的位置。
        Since:
        6.7

      • scrollToTop

        void scrollToTop()
        Scrolls the element into the visible area and aligns top of the element to the top of the visible area. NOTE: The element may not be scrolled completely to the top depending on the layout of other elements.
        将元素滚动到可见区域，然后将元素的顶部与可见区域的顶部对齐。注意：根据其他元素的布局，该元素可能无法完全滚动到顶部。

      • scrollToBottom

        void scrollToBottom()
        Scrolls the element into the visible area and aligns bottom of the element to the bottom of the visible area. NOTE: The element may not be scrolled completely to the bottom depending on the layout of other elements.
        将元素滚动到可见区域，然后将元素的底部与可见区域的底部对齐。注意：根据其他元素的布局，元素可能无法完全滚动到底部。
